title: (x) Agostino invitation classical capitals - Delphian Open {Patricia}
content:
a little help? sorry about the small image...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140622im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image_4675.jpg)

 [‹ (x) small sans serif gif with little to go on - Frutiger {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140622/http:/typophile.com/node/19706 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) UC DRESS - Univers 49 Light Ultra Condensed {Geoff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140622/http:/typophile.com/node/19651 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Will Miller

comments.content:
’ [Garda _( Titling No 2 )_](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140622/http:/www.vllg.com/Feliciano/Garda/mudTyper+Weights/)’, by Mario Feliciano?  
_( Well, Even if its not, ’Garda’ would be a looovely alternate. :)_

Dav

Bauer Text Initials are similar too.

The letterforms look like Delphian but I can’t tell from the sample if the font is inline or not.

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=delphian](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140622/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=delphian "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=delphian")

it’s not quite [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808140622/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/) either.. the A, T and N look slightly different (though it could’ve been slightly customized from Optima). might be a good alternative if you can’t find an exact match.
